title: Shortspell
creator_credit: Stuart Wynn Jones and Kinetic Film Enterprises
brief_description: An animated review of the alphabet in which each letter becomes a picture and each picture becomes the next letter. Both sound and picture are drawn directly onto the film by the artist.
